Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: His laboratory values showed elevated creatine kinase and transaminases .

| Disease |

In this paragraph, the "Disease" entities are "elevated creatine kinase" and "transaminases". These are medical conditions that can indicate issues with muscle damage or liver function, respectively.
